decision_conditions: The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Article 3, Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, Sub paragraph A.1 (c) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse would exceed the height of the highest part of the existing dwellinghouse.

The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue  of the provisions of Article 3, Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, Sub paragraph A.1 (k) (iv) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as the proposed development would include an alteration to part of the roof of the dwellinghouse.

The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue  of the provisions of Article 3, Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, Sub paragraph A.3 (c) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse would form an upper storey on an existing enlargement of the original dwellinghouse and the roof pitch would not be the same as the roof pitch of the original dwelling house.

The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Article 3, Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, Sub paragraph B.1 (b) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as the proposed development would as a result of the works, exceed the height of the highest part of the existing roof.

The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue  of the provisions of Article 3, Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, Sub paragraph B.2 (b) (i)(bb) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as the proposed dormer is not set in from the roof margins by 0.2m.
description: Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include a rear dormer, 2 front roof lights and conversion of roof from hip to gable end with new gable end window (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development)
